item.description:
Learn the Power of Email Marketing!

April 9, 2009
Meeting Time: 6:30PM - 8:45PM

Boston Marketing Learning Group Meeting Location:
Robbins Library
700 Mass Ave
Arlington, MA 02476
781-316-3200

Presentation by:
Zak Barron - Constant Contact

Email Marketing Topics that Will be Covered Include:

Building relationships with your current customers is key to growing your business. Reach them with professional email communications that make you look great!

This interactive email marketing seminar will provide you with valuable information regarding:


  • Best practices and winning strategies in email marketing.
  • How to get and keep quality email subscribers.
  • Increase email deliverability and open rates.
  • Tips for writing compelling email content.
  • See examples of successful email campaigns that build business & drive sales
  • Formulate a customer communication program strategy that really works!
  • This seminar is FREE of charge


To Learn More about Constant Contact, please click here.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lower level conference room, known as the "community" room.
item.name: The Power of Email Marketing Presented by Constant Contact
